Regional intercity rail corridors like this will not only let us connect urban & rural communities, but it will reduce greenhouse gases & improve safety. Thank you to the many partners & community leaders for their collaboration and efforts in this project over many years! (3/3) https://t.co/dlM1HrVpGK
This @USDOTFRA CRISI grant will help push this project to its next phase in bringing reliable and fast intercity passenger rail services to underserved communities across the Southeast. (2/3)

üö®BIG news: Last week, I was joined by @NC_Governor, @MitchLandrieu46, @USDOTFRA Administrator Bose, @Jeric_boyette, @vapassengerrail, & @WakeForest_NC Mayor Jones to announce a historic $57.9M in federal funding to help complete the Raleigh to Richmond Corridor. (1/3)

Yesterday, I announced a historic $57.9M federal investment that will set the Raleigh to Richmond Corridor project in motion - putting it on track to provide clean, fast, & reliable transportation across the Southeast.üöÑ

As we mark Gun Violence Awareness Day, I am reflecting on those we have lost to the epidemic of gun violence in the US, especially these last few weeks. The calls to #EndGunViolence are clear: pass common-sense gun measures NOW. To continue to do nothing is inhumane. #WearOrange https://t.co/bnYXB4vvnw
